title: riot take my money and make mecha rengar already

replies.body: They should totally do an alien vs predator theme with rengar and kha zix

Headhunter Rengar is the predator theme, so from that perspective they already sorta have. Rek'Sai is sorta an Alien/Predator hybrid as well. The themes are definitely there, but they likely have to be very careful so as not to infringe on anything that would get them in trouble :P
